name: @snowblind/router
description: Client Side Routing implementation for Snowblind

scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm publish
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm publish

author: letsmoe
